column6:
"THE LAST DAYS OF CAMELOT" Part 1 (of 3)!,2006,8
King Arthur's mighty kingdom lays in ruins! Death is everywhere. Who could possibly save the day? Why, New Excalibur of course! The Black Knight guest stars in a time traveling tale for the ages!
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | inker:Rick Ketcham | letterer:Tom Orzechowski | colorist:Peter Pantazis | penciller (cover):Michael Ryan | writer:Frank Tieri
